lexUnit.name: hit.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of a moving object or body) come into contact with (someone or something stationary) quickly and forcefully.

sentence.text: He claimed the ball had hit his bat , the square-leg umpire agreed and he was recalled , much to the chagrin of the bowler , Ian Beven .
